dip.gui.order

Class GUIBuild

  • java.lang.Object
    • dip.order.Order
      • dip.order.Build
        • dip.gui.order.GUIBuild
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GUIOrder, Orderable, java.io.Serializable

    public class GUIBuild
extends Build
implements GUIOrder
    GUIOrder implementation of Build order.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
